#summary RoutePlannerAnnotations is a web application that allows a client to find the shortest route(s) between two stations on the London Underground.

= Introduction =

RoutePlannerAnnotations was completed with a team of nine people while training at the FDM Academy. The specs of the project were to create a website that would allow a user to register/login, find the shortest route(s) between two stations and buy tickets once a route has been found.
